control.description-key: Multi-table lookup control that binds to a text field and provides lookup-style record selection.

property.name: boundField
property.description-key: The text field that stores selected lookup values in format guid:tablename;guid:tablename

property.name: recordNamesOutput
property.description-key: Optional output field that receives the display names of selected records as a semicolon-delimited list

property.name: selectionCount
property.description-key: Optional output field that contains the count of currently selected records

property.name: lookupTables
property.description-key: Comma-separated list of table logical names that users can select from (e.g., account,contact)

property.name: defaultEntityType
property.description-key: The default table to show in the lookup dialog when multiple tables are configured. If not set, uses the first table.

property.name: allowMultiSelect
property.description-key: Determines whether users can select multiple records or only a single record

property.name: maxSelections
property.description-key: Maximum number of records that can be selected when multi-select is enabled. Leave empty for unlimited.

property.name: enableLinking
property.description-key: Determines whether clicking on a badge should open the record

property.name: openLinksInModal
property.description-key: When enabled, clicking a linked record opens it in a modal dialog instead of navigating away

property.name: disableMru
property.description-key: When enabled, disables the Most Recently Used items in the lookup dialog

property.name: placeholderText
property.description-key: Text shown when hovering over the empty control
